title: Tiara 2k25
oneLiner: An intuitive platform for effortless event management and participation.
description: Tiara 2k25 is the premier technical fest platform designed to streamline event registrations, schedule tracking, and user engagement for the campus community.
problemStatement: Organizing large-scale college fests involves complex coordination between multiple departments, manual registration processes, and difficulty in providing real-time updates to participants.
targetAudience: Students, Faculty, and External Participants of the college technical fest.
detailedDescription: The platform provides a centralized hub for all fest-related activities. Users can browse events, register with ease, track their participation, and receive real-time notifications about schedule changes.

title: MemeSphere
oneLiner: Integrate memes and GIFs into your online conversations seamlessly.
description: A web extension that brings the power of memes to every text box you use online.
problemStatement: Searching for memes and GIFs in a separate tab interrupts the flow of online conversations.
targetAudience: Social media users and online communicators.
detailedDescription: MemeSphere lives in your browser and provides a quick search and insert feature for memes directly into any web-based chat application.

title: Scriptify
oneLiner: Transform typed text into elegant, cursive handwriting with AI.
description: An AI-powered tool that generates realistic handwriting from digital text.
problemStatement: Digital text often lacks the personal touch of a handwritten note, but writing by hand is time-consuming.
targetAudience: Educators, calligraphers, and individuals seeking a personal touch in digital communication.
detailedDescription: Using deep learning models, Scriptify analyzes handwriting patterns and applies them to any input text to create a high-fidelity image of cursive script.
